bug.author: Echo9573
bug.description:
There are some problems with xgboost model in sqlflow: the following train and validation set and the parameter are the same on both LOCAL & SQLFlow . BUGï¼š , which is shown as follows: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24820352/70767044-b827b300-1d9a-11ea-8f8b-1ce51b6fa428.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24820352/70767147-0937a700-1d9b-11ea-9052-d2c6aa4587e9.png></denchmark-link>
2.Incorrect evaluation results when training xgboost model
LOCAL
SQLFlow
To Explore: 3. Inconsistent with local iteration effect.
LOCAL
SQLFlow
The Complete information files please download this zip file: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sqlflow/files/3958871/compare_local_SQLFlow_xgboost.zip>compare_local_SQLFlow_xgboost.zip</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/shendiaomo>@shendiaomo</denchmark-link> , this case looks like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sqlflow/issues/1397>#1397</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tonyyang-svail>@tonyyang-svail</denchmark-link> follows up it. I will also follow up on this case today.
